Business Development Associate

View all Jobs

Join our fast growing company as a member of our Business Development Team. MiCasa provides software-as-a-service for home builders in an underserved market.

At MiCasa, our builder clients come first. We are inspired by and take pride in our work product so that our builders can rest assured that their homebuyers are having a positive experience with our software. Our Business Development Team is an extension of our brand, offering our builder clients thoughtful and innovative ways to increase upgrades sales. Every existing builder client is a potential future client so their satisfaction is critical to our success.

What’s MiCasa?MiCasa’s cloud-based software provides its home builders the ability to sell their home upgrades, from granite countertops to home automation, online, any place, anytime. Historically, home builders would rely on in-person sales meetings to sell their upgrades, limiting marketing opportunities. MiCasa’s software creates a digital marketplace, providing buyers of new construction the ability to shop outside of a design center. As a result, home builders can analyze, understand and market to home buyers in new and innovative ways, leading to increased sales.

Business Development Candidates are expected to be effective salespeople, excellent communicators and take pride in their work.

Specific responsibilities include:

  • Generate new business by effectively contacting potential builder clients to license MiCasa's software
  • Conduct product demonstrations online and in person to showcase MiCasa
  • Work off our internal list of builder leads, referrals and your own network
  • Administer and collaborate on our digital marketing efforts
  • Attendance at industry events and conferences to connect with builders
  • Follow-up with builder clients to ensure their satisfaction and continued use of MiCasa at future communities

Qualifications include:

  • 3+ years sales experience in a business to business environment
  • Experience in home building related fields, which may include designers, title and escrow reps, sales and marketing companies and mortgage reps, to name a few
  • A results oriented team player and excellent communicator that wants to be part of a dynamic growing organization
  • Extra credit: option sales or design center experience
